markdownRemark.html:
Now that I have some free time off from school I've decided to rebuild the blog. I'm using Gatsby with markdown pages for content.

Over the next few weeks I have a few features I'd like to add before I consider it in a done state.

Todo:

  • RSS
  • Search
  • Tagging
  • Convert inline CSS to Styled Components
  • Comments
  • Sharing
  • Hopefully some better styling
